short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sends the current tab's URL to the w3c validator service to display the validation report in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides web developers with quick one-click access to the w3c validation service to check HTML and CSS syntax in a document.  When clicked, the URL of the current tab is sent to validator.w3.org/ and the results of the validation check are displayed in a new tab.
